DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intravenous paracetamol effective treat labor pain .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Effects Intravenous Paracetamol Labor Pain
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists physical class III term patient ( ≥ 37 week gestation ) previous cesarean section hypertension , preeclampsia , eclampsia intrauterine growth retardation intrauterine fetal death morbid obesity ( body mass index ≥ 35 ) allergy study drug
